name: Cube Heroes
description:
Shuffle to match abilities and monsters! Clear all levels and defeat the final boss!

Cube Heroes is a magic cube roguelite inspired by other classics of the genre.

Control 4 heroes, each with its own abilities and stats. Shuffle the magic cube in order to match attack abilities with your enemies and defensive abilities with your allies. Items improve your chances of reaching and defeating the final boss. Death is permanent, so be careful with your choices!


  • Puzzle style gameplay with roguelite elements
  • Many enemies and heroes, each one with unique abilities and stats
  • Choose an item after clearing a room
  • The nondeterministic AI makes every gameplay session unique
  • Challenges add flavour and variety to the game


  • 15 levels
  • 30 enemies
  • 40 abilities
  • 26 items
  • 6 challenges
